trans-unit.source: Provides caching functionality for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 的快取功能。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> does not cache bitmap data automatically.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>自動不快取點陣圖資料。

trans-unit.source: Using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> can improve performance in scenarios where multiple operations (such as clipping an image or scaling) need to be performed on a single bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap>可改善效能案例中需要單一的點陣圖上執行多個作業 （例如影像和結束時間裁剪或擴充）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The source bitmap that is being cached.
trans-unit.target: 正在快取的來源點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: Initialization options for the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖影像的初始化選項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the bitmap is cached to memory.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何將點陣圖快取到記憶體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> that has the specified source, bitmap create options, and bitmap cache option.
trans-unit.target: 初始化已指定來源、點陣圖建立選項和點陣圖快取選項之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 於 <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
